Class EngineMetricStatementView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.eeutil.domain.metric.EngineMetricStatementView

  • public class EngineMetricStatementView
extends java.lang.Object
    Metric information pertaining to data windows

    • Constructor Detail

      • EngineMetricStatementView

        public EngineMetricStatementView()
        Ctor.

      • EngineMetricStatementView

        public EngineMetricStatementView(java.lang.String viewName,
                         int streamNum,
                         java.lang.Long bytes,
                         java.lang.Long eventCount,
                         java.util.List<EngineMetricStatementViewContained> contained,
                         java.lang.Integer uniqueKeyCount)
        Ctor.
        Parameters:
        viewName - data window name
        streamNum - stream number in the from clause
        bytes - memory measurement, if available
        eventCount - number of events held
        contained - metrics for view contained or managed by the view, i.e. grouped, intersected or union
        uniqueKeyCount - number of unique keys managed, available only for unique-type data windows
